impactDepartmentOption: Impact department for a profit company
credentialHintText: Can include your degrees, certificates, online courses

employerDetailsText: Your employer will be requested to fill in these details.
credentialsDescriptionText: Here all your credentials issued or requested.

organizationRegistrationMessageSuffix: is registering its organization on Socious.
termsAndPrivacyMessage: By continuing, you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
testimonialMessage: Socious streamlined my startup's hiring process, saving time and money while finding skilled, passionate candidates.
verificationLinkSentMessage: We sent a verification link to
accountCreationSuccessMessage: Your account has been successfully created
onboardingStartMessage: Onboarding starts after signup and can be skipped
createOrganizationPrompt: Create your organization and start hiring
organizationCategoryPrompt: Please select the category that best describes your organization
organizationDescriptionPrompt: Tell us more about your organization
addLogoAndDescriptionPrompt: Add your logo and short description
verificationDetailsPrompt: Get your organization verified to issue credentials.
companyRegistrationDocPrompt: Send a company registration document such as a company certificate/equivalent along with your organization name
verificationProcessingTime: Our verification team will take 1-3 days to process your verification request.
verificationCompleteMessage: An email and notification will be sent to you upon successful verification and you will then be able to issue credentials.
uploadDocumentPrompt: Please upload your company registration document, like a certificate or equivalent.
documentsSentMessage: Our verification team will take 1-3 days to process your verification request. An email and notification will be sent to you upon successful verification and you will then be able to issue credentials.
applicationIssueText: There was an issue with your application
contactForIssuesMessage: Our team will be in contact with you by email. If your request is urgent please contact us directly at info@socious.io.
verificationIssueMessage: We are reviewing your submitted documents; we will notify you once it is complete.
organizationDescription: Enables people to unleash their innovation power to protect the ocean.
certificateRequestSentText: Sent a request for a digital certificate confirming her education at your organization.
messagePreview: Sent you a request to verify her experience
additionalInfoHint: Please include any other information such as grade or faculty and departments, etc...
approvalSuccessText: Has approved your request and issued you a digital certificate. Claim now.
blockchainText: Socious uses blockchain technology to make credentials transparent and traceable.
ownershipText: By claiming your certificate, you maintain full control and ownership of your credentials. You can easily share them with employers, educational institutions, or anyone else who requires proof of your qualifications directly from your digital wallet.
certificateInstructionsText: Open your Socious Wallet Scan the QR code below Accept the invitation to receive your certificate
verifyExperienceText: To verify your experience and request credentials, we need to verify your identity.
transparencyExplanationText: This means your achievements are transparent and verifiable by anyone. To make this work, we need to confirm you are the rightful owner of the credentials you're requesting. This verification helps prevent fraud and protects the value of your credentials. We leverage digital ID technology to verify your identity without storing your personal details.
appOnboardingText: Complete the app's onboarding process, which will create a digital ID on the blockchain. Verify your identity with Veriff, our partner for identity verification.
appOnboardingAtalaText: Go through the app’s onboarding process which will create a decentralized ID on Atala Prism. Verify your identity with Veriff, our partner for identity verification.
downloadAndOpenSociousWalletButton: Download and open Socious Wallet app
receiveVerifiableCredentialsText: To receive verifiable credentials you need to verify your identity.
profileVerifiedSuccessText: Congratulations! Your profile has been successfully verified
requestDigitalCertificatesText: You can now request digital certificates.
chooseCredentialToShareText: Choose the credential you would like to share:
confirmInformationText: Confirm the below information to send your request to
sendVerificationRequestHeading: Send verification request to existing organization
transparencyExplanationTextExtended: This means your achievements are transparent and verifiable by anyone. To make this work, we need to confirm you are the rightful owner of the credentials you're requesting. This verification helps prevent fraud and protects the value of your credentials. We leverage the power digital ID technology to verify your identity without storing your personal details.
appOnboardingAtalaTextExtended: Go through the app’s onboarding process which will create a decentralized ID on Atala Prism. Verify your identity with Veriff, our KYC partner.
noCertificateClaimedText: If there is no corresponding work certificate claimed. (this includes certificate statuses like: “pending”, “declined”, “withdrawn”. “issued” etc.
editAfterClaimText: Show only after the certificate is claimed, after this, Umaya can’t edit (except description)Rationale, if Umaya edits the info, the modified info is not verified
certificateIssuedClaimableText: The work certificate has been issued and is claimable by Umaya
credentialRevokedText: The credential has been revoked (outside the scope for now)
credentialApprovedNote: Note: once a credential request is approved it moves to Issued tab
issuedCredentialsArchiveNote: Note: only issued credentials can be moved to archive
requestPendingApprovalText: The request is pending approval from OP
credentialSentToUmayaText: The credential has been sent to Umaya
